question.title: 'mappedBy' a property named 'clienti' which does not exist in the target entity 'com.example.demo.entity.Ordini'
question.body:
I have a relation oneTomany and manytoone

I have Client:

@Entity
public class Client {

    @Id
    @GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.SEQUENCE)
    private BigDecimal id;
  
    @OneToMany(mappedBy = "client",cascade = CascadeType.ALL)
    private List<order> orderlist;

and the order:

@Entity
@EntityListeners(AuditingEntityListener.class)
public class Order implements Serializable{

    @Id
    @GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.SEQUENCE)
    private BigDecimal id;


    @ManyToOne
    @JoinColumn(name = "client_id")
    private Client client_id;

it gives me these exception .

Caused by: org.hibernate.AnnotationException: Collection 'com.example.demo.entity.Client.orderList' is 'mappedBy' a property named 'client' which does not exist in the target entity 'com.example.demo.entity.Ordini'

any

have a relation oneTomany and manytoone. Anyone can help me what I wrong?

answers.body:
mappedBy attribute should be related entities exact property name.

@Entity
public class Client {

    @Id
    @GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.SEQUENCE)
    private BigDecimal id;
  
    // Related Entities Property is :
    // private Client client_id;
    @OneToMany(mappedBy = "client_id",cascade = CascadeType.ALL)
    private List<order> orderlist;

}

question_comments.body: your Order has client_id property, not client. So rename to Client client
